r.d: Package to validate various datas. It includes : - numbers (min/max, decimal or not) - email (syntax, domain check, rfc822) - string (predifined type alpha upper and/or lowercase, numeric,...) - date (min, max) - uri (RFC2396) - possibility valid multiple data with a single method call (::multiple)
